resources.string: The format on the page should be like: number:msg,number:msg. \nNumbers and messages are separated by commas. \nFor example: 050...05531:Hello,0521615..02:Hi
The format on the page should be like: number,number. \nNumbers are separated by commas. \nFor example: 050...05531,0521615..02
A token is a unique identifier that authenticates a user for API interactions. \nIt\'s usually generated by the server after successful login. \nPlease enter your token below:
